issue.subject: Adding "enumeration" entity type
issue.description:
For now, "list" attributes are defined for themselves.
When multiple "list" attributes point on same list codes, each content list must be redefined.

The goal is to add an entity type called "enumeration" which can be used by one or more "list" attributes.

With such logical, backoffice interface should be re-engineered based on more strict UML definitions...
